attributes.action: Nursery's to shut for key workers only and for us to have priority testing
attributes.additional_details: Nurseries are not being recognised as an education sector and we feel at risk as we are expected to stay open as normal with no protection.
attributes.background: For nursery staff to be more recognised. We should be closed for key workers only and to have access to priority testing and vaccine.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Provide Covid testing kits for private nurseries and early years settings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570316

Only open Early Years settings for key workers, vulnerable or SEN children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566867

Prioritise early years practitioners to urgently receive Covid 19 vaccine.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743

Provide routine Covid tests for Early Years and prioritise staff for vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567143
